response.overview: Two lifelong best friends, Michael Wilson and James King, are pushed to the edge by lifeâ€™s relentless hardships. Michael loses his job and faces foreclosure, while James struggles to keep his sick mother alive. Their loyalty is unshakable, until a mysterious man named Vincent DuPont approaches Michael with a sealed black envelope, offering a chance to win everything back. The friends enter a high-stakes poker game inside a chilling mansion, alongside other desperate competitors. But as players are eliminated, the true cost becomes clear. In the final hand, loyalty shatters and survival demands the ultimate betrayal between the two.
response.tagline: Keep your friends close but your enemies closer
response.title: Final Hand
